personalInfo.title: Certified Senior Data Scientist | Analytics Lead

summary.professionalSummary: Certified Senior Data Scientist, accredited by the Data Science Council of America (DASCA), and former Technical AI Ambassador at HSBC, with over 10 years of experience leading AI, machine learning, data science and advanced analytics initiatives, primarily in the financial sector. Demonstrated success in fraud mitigation, risk management, client service operation, and marketing optimization, delivering data-driven solutions that improve decision-making and operational efficiency. Now ready to leverage strong analytical skills and technical leadership experience to create value for future employers after a career break due to family relocation.

positions.title: Senior Data Scientist
positions.description: Spearheaded AI and data science innovation initiatives focused on HSBC global wholesale banking business in fraud risk mitigation, workforce management, and client service operations.

achievements.title: GenAI Solution for Suspicious Fraud Case Review
achievements.description: Initiated and led the generative AI agent development for assisting the fraud case review report generation, boosting team productivity by reducing up to 35% case review processing time

achievements.title: Explainable AI Solution for Loan Fraud Mitigation
achievements.description: Engineered the Explainable Artificial Intelligence solution, which integrated ML model with expert decision model, for 1st party lending fraud mitigation, increasing detection accuracy by 30+% and averting annual fraud losses up to $100 million globally

achievements.title: Automated Demand Forecast Engine
achievements.description: Automated the training and maintenance of 1000+ Meta Prophet forecasting models, boosting demand forecasting accuracy by 60% for wholesale client service

achievements.title: Machine Learning Solution for Workforce Management
achievements.description: Pioneered the integration of machine learning algorithms to develop personalized performance benchmarks based on workload, case complexity, and experience, enhancing evaluation equity and boosting client manager productivity

positions.title: VP of Analytics
positions.description: Managed a team of data scientists and data analysts, supporting HSBC global retail banking business.

achievements.title: Machine Learning Solution for Credit Card Application Fraud Detection
achievements.description: Championed the development of a real-time machine learning solution for credit card fraud detection, reducing fraud losses by $0.8 million USD in 2021

achievements.title: Marketing Optimization by Machine Learning
achievements.description: Revamped marketing campaigns by A/B test and machine learning algorithm, resulting in a 5x increase in conversion rates

achievements.title: Intelligent COVID-19 Risk Management Tool
achievements.description: Initialized and led the Intelligence system development for COVID-19 risk management, winning the Best Alliance award of Global Service Elite 2020

positions.title: Big Data Engineering Lead
positions.description: Led big data engineering initiatives and data governance architecture development.

achievements.title: Data Governance Architecture Development
achievements.description: Pioneered data governance architecture development, cleansing 2000+ tables (3TB) across 10 bank systems, enhancing analytics efficiency

achievements.title: KPI Dashboards and Risk Control System
achievements.description: Led the development of 30+ operational and financial KPI dashboards, and designed and implemented credit and fraud strategies, establishing a data-driven risk control system for post-loan risk monitoring

positions.title: Risk Data Science Lead
positions.description: Led risk data science initiatives for consumer finance operations.

achievements.title: Fraud Strategy Development for POS Loans
achievements.description: Spearheaded the fraud strategy development for POS loans, resulting in 26% reduction of fraud loss

achievements.title: Machine Learning Based Risk Model Development
achievements.description: Led the machine learning based risk model development, supporting the consumer loan risk management

positions.title: Payment Data Analytics Lead
positions.description: Led payment data analytics and fraud detection initiatives for e-commerce platform.

achievements.title: Marketing Campaign Optimization
achievements.description: Led the machine learning initiatives that optimized marketing campaigns, increasing adoption by 30% and reducing marketing costs by 15%
